entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Parry Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:34 p.m. EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.5Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 3:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
Temperature: -3.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 73 %
Dewpoint: -7.6°C
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight then snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with periods of rain in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late in the morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Temperature rising to 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Temperature rising to 10 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow. High 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
